# fossasia14
FOSSASIA 2014's Website for Google Code In

Running
---
Use the following command to run -

```sh
jekyll serve --baseurl=""
```
then go to http://localhost:4000 to view the site

Live
---
http://fossasia.github.io/2014.fossasia.org
